info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 6:49AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marshall, western Kittson and southeastern Pembina Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 649 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bowesmont, or 20 miles northeast of Grafton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hallock, Drayton, Lancaster, Kennedy, Donaldson, Joliette and Northcote. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 185 and 209. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
